website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular and affordable model offers users a classic country feel with durable construction.
pros: Slanted interior allows for food and water to run into the drain, avoiding food buildup
Glossy finish makes for easy cleaning
Incredibly spacious and fantastic quality for the inexpensive price
cons: Sink showcases brand logo on bottom right corner
Some buyers had issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sink
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sink. We were remodeling our kitchen and I knew I wanted a white farm sink. Everywhere we looked they were over 1k. I was so bummed until we found this one! It worked great and was easy to install. The only downside is the little logo on the bottom right corner. Don't love it, but worth it to pay half the price of sinks in stores like home depot. We were worried about scratching so we just got a metal grate for the bottom and so far we have had no issues. We have had it installed for about 9 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. Wish there wasn't a small decal on the right bottom corner but oh well. The only thing I will mention is that you have to get an EXTENDED flange for this sink as a standard one won't be deep enough. They get one less star because they weren't super helpful in helping me find a suitable flange for it... I also ended up needing to get a flange that didn't match the faucet because it's not a standard size flange. Otherwise, it's a nice sink,
customer_reviews.author: HeyThere!

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, worth the purchase. Not cheap. Not cheesy.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a great sink. Solid. Doesn’t scratch. Doesn’t stain. Looks great. Can bath 2 babies in it no problem. Think of a larger faucet when installing. Ours works great but would ideally like a faucet with more arch (the sink is that big)
customer_reviews.author: Kmac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to farmhouse kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink. We have purchased several of these over the years since we are home builders. This one was by far the best. Looks great and for less than what everyone else is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best buys on Amazon I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best buys on Amazon I've had so far. I though gathering the supplies to convert to a farm sink was going to be challenging. But Amazon really was so convenient and easy and cost effective! I ordered the sink and it was delivered to my door within a week or so. I never had one worry about getting it home, lifting or carrying. The contractor carried from the garage to the kitchen. Order the facet and the pendulum light as well from Amazon. The only problem and not convenient was neither the facet or the sink provided a phangle for the sink so a quick trip to Lowes was needed to purchase the flange.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Top quality sink
customer_reviews.text: I saw it on someone's wishlist and just had to get it. Because they told me to. Worth every penny! Super heavy, apparently, so be careful installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just installed yesterday, so I will wait to see how it holds up-but as of right now-I love this sink-it looks great and was much easier to install than we anticipated! I did my research and though this was between $50-250 more than some of the others I looked at-I’m so glad I made this purchase because the others didn’t have it sloped so the water would drain easily!!! So excited about my new fire clay farmhouse sink!
customer_reviews.author: Darrick R. Castronova

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful farmhouse sink
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful farmhouse sink. Don't have it fully installed yet, but it's in place and ready. It was the most affordable sink i could find online, and so far, has met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gaylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink at a great price. Took a star off because arrived with damaged side. Fortunately, i can flip and have the damaged side on the back, but when notified seller of defect, i was told to take it up with Amazon and they were not responsible. Oh well, I'll just install adequately and this will be a very heavy and durable/beautiful sink.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Caddell

customer_reviews.title: The bottom surface will scuff.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this sink for about 3 months. We installed it and were so excited. However after a few days we noticed 2 scuff marks in the sink. We now have had to use a rubber mat on the bottom so that dishes don’t damage the surface. It’s mounted to our countertop so we are really stuck and replacing it would be so difficult. I was hopeing that it would hold up better. The marks are subtle but without a mat I’m sure it would get worse and worse.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Lind

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new build, so I did not install myself but it looks great and is super easy to clean. Heard they can break dishes easily but have not had that problem myself. Has held up well so far and again it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Owles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink at an even greater price. Love the size! There can be tons of dishes in there and you wouldn’t even know looking from a distance hah! It was easy to install and great quality also cleans up well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: This sink is beautiful and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful and exactly what I was looking for. The only bummer is there is a little manufacturer's logo on both sides, bottom right of sink that cannot be removed. I am going to see if I can paint over it. Other than that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maria a.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this sink. Remodeled the kitchen and looked several places before purchasing this one. It arrived timely and in excellent condition. Had our plumber install it and they did have to use a different size flange. The only thing I wish I knew is what size/brand/model of metal sink protector would work. I plan to invest in one to keep the sink looking new and some of them are costly.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Roy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very very pleased with quality and look. No complaints other than, in general, it is a commitment to install one of these. I almost didn’t buy it for that reason but, as my husband noted, you really can’t have a farmhouse kitchen without a farmhouse sink!
customer_reviews.author: dana f

customer_reviews.title: Real Nice Great Price
customer_reviews.text: First one showed up cracked, but Amazon is great, sent it back and got another in a couple days....no problem. Looks great in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robino

customer_reviews.title: great sink but it takes a little more work to ...
customer_reviews.text: great sink but it takes a little more work to install so be sure to ok it with your plumber
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to get working
customer_reviews.text: Having difficulty with both garbage disposal install and finding a rack to fit inside the sink that doesn't cost a small fortune. Sink doesn't come with any installation instructions or recommended accessories on Fine Fixtures website.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Actual Measurement
customer_reviews.text: This product only measures 29.5 in width. It is not 30 in. I have to return this as our base cabinet gap will be too big on either side of the sink to fill in
customer_reviews.author: drn

customer_reviews.title: I really love the look of this sink
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this sink. I have not had it for long so not sure about the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Exclent product
customer_reviews.text: Doing a kitchen remodel and couldn’t resist this sink. It was everything I thought it would be. Love everything about this style.
customer_reviews.author: susannah

customer_reviews.title: Very good looks like porcelain very Bea you though 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very good looks like porcelain very Bea you though 👍
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is solid. Well made and exceeds our expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Just received my sink and it’s beautiful. I shopped around and for the price, and based on reviews, this is what I purchased. It’s extremely high quality and beautifully made. Make sure you purchase the deep flange, that part can be difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Perez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived VERY broken
customer_reviews.text: This sink may have been wonderful... if it wasn’t broken in a million pieces. The box looked like it rolled down a mountain when it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Deeg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and quality sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sink that looks stunning in my new kitchen at a huge savings compared to big box stores. Arrived perfect and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: philip j.

customer_reviews.title: This sink is an excellent buy. It is exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: This sink is an excellent buy. It is exactly as shown. The insIide is slanted so the water and food stuff runs to the drain which is a must. There are farmhouse sinks that are not slanted and a lot of rinsing is required in order to keep the sink from having debris constantly collecting. It is very heavy and does require a sturdy under the sink mounting rack. It really made my new kitchen in an old condo building look modern. It is also nice for washing large pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I receive so many compliments. Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Denise O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sink
customer_reviews.text: I've had installed for a week. I love it. It's beautiful...definitely an upgrade. It's roomy. It is nice having sufficient space to wash anything. I'll never go back to a double bowl sink.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis ward

customer_reviews.title: imperfect drain hole
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to do the two star thing... Have an issue with the drain hole. It isn't quite perfect and the flange will not fit. Seller please contact me ASAP. Otherwise, beautiful sink.
customer_reviews.author: 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great look, easily scuffs
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and size of sink. It scuffs pretty easily. Don't see this sink lasting and keeping look for years as it's used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Sink was exactly what was advertised. It arrived well packed. It is very nice, but heavy. One bit of information I wish had been provided in the description; the sink requires a deep flange to mount the garbage disposal. The fire clay sink is thicker and the standard flange does not work. We had to order the deep flange and that delayed the installation by 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Reyes Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. The sink was exactly as pictured. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: David Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Best price I could find any wear and is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find any wear and is beautiful! Had it installed last week and I would buy it again in a second!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. It's just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't know if it is any good yet since I've ordered it twice and both time ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't know if it is any good yet since I've ordered it twice and both time the sink was either shattered or cracked. May try again and update this review. Certainly frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

product_meta.title: Fine fixtures Sutton Fireclay sink, 30" Apron Front Farmhouse Kitchen Sink. Solid (Not Hollow)…
product_meta.description: Incomparable craftsmanship emphasizes the sleekness that Sutton brings to the modern kitchen. With its smooth front finish, this fireclay sink is as dependable as it is durable, and it will add reassuring warmth and style to your kitchen for years to come.
feature_bullets: Fireclay sink, fired in a 1600 degree - Crack and scratch resistant.
The sink is handcrafted from fine fireclay and has a smooth surface. This sink is a solid thickness and not 'HOLLOW' as other suppliers.
Due to the firing process, shrinking will occur and named dimensions are nominal only
Bowl gives you uninterrupted space for washing and stacking dishes or other household tasks
The material is naturally sound-deadening, minimizing sound and vibration for a Quieter time at the sink

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
